snippet: The right-hander Mike Pelfrey, a 2005 draft choice the Mets had wanted to turn into an ace, signed a one-year deal Monday with the Minnesota Twins, after having Tommy John surgery in May.
abstract: MLB Roundup; pitcher Mike Pelfrey, who missed most of 2011 season with New York Mets after having Tommy John elbow surgery, signs a one-year, $4 million deal with Minnesota Twins; other baseball developments noted.
lead_paragraph: The right-hander Mike Pelfrey, a 2005 draft choice the Mets had wanted to turn into an ace, signed a one-year deal Monday with the Minnesota Twins, after having Tommy John surgery in May.

headline.seo: Mike Pelfrey, Mets Pitcher, Signs With Minnesota Twins
headline.main: Mets’ Pelfrey, Coming Off Surgery, Signs Deal With Twins
headline.print_headline: Mets’ Pelfrey, Coming Off Surgery, Signs Deal With Twins
